name: Soy's Sky Garden
description:
Soy needs your help! 

Help her get rid of the evil weeds in her garden! Use the arrow keys to move and the space bar to remove the weeds (Press R to restart).
But be fast! if you don't remove the weeds in time, the ground will fall and you might just fall with it 💀

The game was made in unity, it took the three of us about 12 hours to make it work. But it was very fun learning experience!

Credits:
Art - https://itch.io/profile/kristinksn & https://itch.io/profile/makritza
Code - https://itch.io/profile/evilcookiz
Music - https://mixkit.co/free-stock-music/children/
Font - https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Bangers?query=bangers#standard-styles
